title: Urf and it being way too fast.
body: Idk if its just me but my games have been consistently over before 15 minutes. Urf definitely didn't feel like this the last time. The game is ending wayy too fast. This mode has actually brought me back to this game quite a few times. Not this time. Idk how or why it's like this but it's shit. I used to rag on anyone who would q for urf and do nothing but split all game, as if it was there modo in life to win no matter the cost. I could give fuck all for winning at the cost of a fun game.

replies.body:
The whole point of URF is way too fast..

That said, it has not really changed since it was added 5 seasons ago - back then the whole game was much slower, so URF was also slower.

.......

Ultra
rapid
fire

"way to fast"

THE GAMES NAME IS LITERALLY MEANING FAST

Well reading boards it seems sr last 20-25mins.
Considering urf is faster it is not so shocking
